value.name: Arakawa Under the Bridge
value.original_name: 荒川アンダー ザ ブリッジ
value.overview: Ko Ichinomiya's family motto is "Never be indebted to anyone," but after losing his pants and falling into the Arakawa River, he quickly finds himself in debt to his savior, the cutely insane Nino who happens to live under the bridge. To repay her, he vows to help her with her desire to "experience love." Along the way he'll meet the river's other residents, including a hot-blooded kappa, a Sister in drag, and a literal rock star.

value.name: Under the Bridge
value.overview: Fourteen-year old Reena Virk went to join friends at a party and never returned home. Through the eyes of Rebecca Godfrey and a local police officer, learn the hidden world of the young girls accused of the murder — revealing startling truths about the unlikely killer.

value.name: Arakawa Under the Bridge
value.original_name: 荒川アンダー ザ ブリッジ
value.overview: Kou Ichinomiya has always lived according to the creed of his wealthy, successful family: never be in debt to anyone. But one day, under the Arakawa Bridge, his life is saved by a homeless girl named Nino. In order to pay her back, Kou promises to be her boyfriend; and thus begins his new life under the bridge.

value.name: Water Under the Bridge
value.overview: Water Under the Bridge is a 1980 mini series based on the 1977 novel by Sumner Locke Elliott.
